CustomField.description: Shows the current local time (without date) for the Lead.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(tz__UTF_Offset__c), "Unknown", TEXT( IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), 12, VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) &":"& MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 15, 2 ) &" "& IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( NOW()+ tz__UTF_Offset__c /24 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) & " " & IF( $Setup.tz__lt_app_settings__c.tz__Abbreviation__c, tz__Timezone__c,"") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the local time (without date) for the Lead.
CustomField.label: Local Time
